actions.text: On agreeing to the Ganske amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 295 - 128 (Roll no. 349).

description: Amendment prohibits the Patent and Trademark Office from issuing patents for surgical procedures, with exceptions dealing with patents for equipment, composition of matter, and biotechnological processes.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit funds appropriated in the bill for the Patent Office from being used to issue patents on medical procedures.
